original_title: SL Rupee depreciates further against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated further against the US Dollar (USD) today, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD stands at Rs 311.60 while the selling rate is Rs. 328.92.
Yesterday's buying rate of USD was Rs. 303.19 while the selling rate was Rs. 318.99.
